text: Sadka (visesa kisimako dana) matra gariba, ra nimukhaharuko nimti hun, ra jo yasa kamaka lagi niyukta gari'eka hun ra uniharuko lagi jasaka hrdayala'i akrsta garnu ra rijha'una abhista huncha ra dasaharula'i mukta gara'unuma ra rniharuko rna tirnala'i ra allahako batoma ra yatriharuko sahayatako nimti. Yo allahako tarphabata patha'i'eko anivarya adesa ho. Allaha sabaikura jannevala, atyanta tatvadarsi cha
